subject: Re: for babiarz3
author: DAna
full_text:
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "babiarz3" <babiarz3@...> wrote:
>"RS_470 Files 12-28-07" bhali333 there the top e.v.p.s thats where i 
hear them

> I thought I had listened to the "father file" but I can't locate it
> now. Any help?
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "DAna" <cute_blonde_n_corpus23@> 
wrote:
> >
> > Now I am sure you arent aware of who I am being, noone else other 
> > than misty welcomed me to this group. Being I am not professional 
at 
> > e.v.p.s but yet have gone through listening to many of them from 
> > trustful resources, your e.v.p.s make me a bit leery. NOt trying 
to 
> > be rude, so dont go get all upset right off the bat. In your 
e.v.p.s, 
> > this one especially, alot of them sound like you, not the part 
where 
> > you asking questions, but where your dad is supposively answering 
> > you. NOw everyone has their own right to opinion so there is now 
need 
> > to get defensive, if all is real there would be nothing to get 
mad 
> > about. I just cant help but notice how odd it is that your e.v.p. 
> > questions to your father, seems to answer right away when you ask 
the 
> > question. Also, i notice that after you ask the question i hear 
> > something being turned on that has contains the answer to that 
> > question. Whether it be your dad or not. I feel its you that is 
> > answering, but let me tell you why i figure this.. and please you 
> > would like to defend you side of things that would be great, 
maybe i 
> > would be able to change my opinion on the matter. But as of now, 
> > e.v.p.s are usually done on the same tape that the questions are 
on, 
> > then in a rewind you can hear you and the e.v.p. but to me it 
sound 
> > like you put the e.v.p. response on another tape. i am not trying 
to 
> > start any kind of fight or be cruel, maybe i could learn 
something on 
> > behalf of how you do your work... thank you
> >
>
